Articles.Content: Just now I started up KSP and in the Mun menu I just saw an easter egg that spooked me I was going to load a new career then suddenly a spacecraft popped out then showed of lights like a UFO I wonder if it's a bug or an easter egg update on 24.2? I really want to know so people please comment about this anomaly in the Mun start screen I need to know more,if you found any links that involves this easter egg copy and paste it on your comment I need to know more.

Right on the first page of this very forum: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/88286-SPOILER-%28possibly%29-New-main-menu-screen

Thread closed
